Thrives on challenge and solves problems with creativity and persistence.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Shag Driver Opr- Amarillo PBX - B Shift - Full Time

Location: Amarillo, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Details:

Shag Driver Opr- Amarillo PBX - B Shift - Full Time 

Job Description:

This position is responsible for maintaining a smooth and accurate flow of trailers to the docks while maintaining a safe work environment and adhering to Tyson policies and procedures.

Tasks:

These positions will work at the PBX facility.Must be willing and able to meet job requirements such as standing, walking, bending, stretching, climbing, pushing, pulling and reaching.Must be willing and able to lift, push, pull, and carry at least 70 pounds.This position works outside in extreme hot and/or cold environments (-10 to 110 degrees) and also requires driving during inclement weather.This position requires continuously moving trailers in and out of loading dock.Must be willing and able to communicate on two way radios with dispatchers, PBX coordinators, and PBX manager.

Requirements: 

Must have a valid Driver's licenseBe at least 18 years of age or older.NO DUI/DWIs in the last 12 months.Previous Tyson Employees must wait 180 days before applying and cannot have more than 3 rehires.

Relocation Assistance Eligible:

No

Work Shift: 

B Shift (United States of America)

Hourly Applicants ONLY -You must complete the task after submitting your application to provide additional information to be considered for employment.

Tyson is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will be considered without regard to race, national origin, color, religion, age, genetics, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or veteran status.

We provide our team members and their families with paid time off; 401(k) plans; affordable health, life, dental, vision and prescription drug benefits; and more.

CCPA Notice. If you are a California resident, and would like to learn more about what categories of personal information we collect when you apply for this job, and how we may use that information, please read our CCPA Job Applicant Notice at Collection, click here.

Experience Level (if available): None
<JD_END>
